promptVersions.body:
Kickboard is simple and a great device to innovate and collaborate with colleagues.


First, though, you will want to set up a couple things. If you want to invite folks that are external, say, a customer, you will need to setup a public site.


Second, you will need to load at least 1 template for user to get started.


Also, assign the Kickboard_User permission set to any internal folks that will be using Kickboard.
promptVersions.description: Prompt to guide users on how to get started.
promptVersions.title: Getting Started
